1382.12.text: the grass out and I'm pulling all the weeds.

1384.32.text: And it's sandy, it's whatever. I'm doing rows

1386.59.text: and I'm watering it. And I put in the hard work.

1389.87.text: to see my Golden Poppies come someday.

1393.14.text: Well, I wait and I wait.

1398.62.text: It grows a little. I get a little more happy.

1401.66.text: But time passes and I'm wondering

1403.24.text: when are they ever going to bloom?

1407.80.text: Do you know? I was growing weeds.

1410.21.text: Not one of the Golden Poppies ever sprouted.

1413.56.text: Not one. I never saw the orange.

1417.93.text: I am not a good gardener.

1420.92.text: I love in God's economy, it's exactly the opposite.

1423.65.text: You know in Galatians chapter 6, we already read this,

1426.04.text: it said, "a man will reap what he sows."

1429.23.text: I want to tell you what you put in good

1435.87.text: but when you see something that needs to be done

1438.27.text: and you do it for the glory of God,

1439.60.text: we will reap together, my friends.

1442.17.text: And we will rejoice together in the harvest at the end.

1446.14.text: That God has used us, a bit of our goodness

1448.86.text: so they could see the true goodness.

1450.82.text: And so my question is as we leave:

1452.60.text: What is it that you know you need to do

1457.28.text: Is it something with your family?

1459.54.text: Is it something in a relationship?

1461.60.text: Is it something that God clearly has called you to do

1464.80.text: and you've been making excuses why not

1466.98.text: to do what God says? Go ahead.

1470.23.text: Be good as I have been good.

1472.82.text: Do it to the glory of God.

1475.46.text: And as we end, let me pray for you

1477.68.text: as we try to be good. We pray.

1481.85.text: Lord, thank You for being the good and doing

1486.74.text: Thank you for rescuing me in my

1488.28.text: desperate need and healing every wound.

1491.24.text: With the knowledge of your great love, let me live

1495.11.text: Help me to clearly see the good I should do

1499.46.text: Help me to trust that as I sow by your strength,

1504.70.text: Through the goodness that people see in me may they

1507.50.text: finally see the goodness of You. Amen.
